author: guitargeek
body:
#### PR description:

PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/26814 caused some workflows in the IB to crash, see issue https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/27219.

There was a usage of the `photonIDValueMapProducer` which was not tested in the bot tests and that requires the gedPhotons collection instead of the slimmedPhotons, which I made the new default instead of auto-detecting the right collection:

https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/master/DQMOffline/Trigger/python/HLTEGTnPMonitor_cfi.py#L992

I propose to just fix it in the same way as the `egmPhotonIDs` were treated a few lines below: cloning the object and then resetting the input collection. This  should  be the safest way, as I can't run the matrix tests due to not being able to access the necessary files right now...

__Note:__ needs to be tested with workflows 136.7801, 136.7803, 1040.0 explicitly, as these are the ones that were crashing and they are not covered by the limited matrix tests performed by the bot.

#### PR validation:

```
python  DQMOffline/Trigger/python/EgammaMonitoring_cff.py
```
title: Bugfix after "Adapting MVAVariableHelper to new E/gamma UL format and removal of MultiToken"
